page.title: 17Demo about the Green Belt
page.content: Parents from the Sidcup Area held a {demonstration}outside Wednesdays Bexley Council Meeting. The protest was about proposals that some believe could destroy local Green Belt. Councillor John Harrington presented a{lengthy petition}of several hundred signatures to the council. The plans included selling off playing field lands from five primary schools,including Dulverton and Sidcup Hill,also Green Belt land in North Cray. Parents have also{engaged a solicitor {to fight the proposals,}which would mean that the land would be sold for housing,raising several million pounds for council funds, but this would not necessarily be used for education. { There are fears in the area that this {could start wholesale development of {remaining Green Belt land.
